product_overview: Testsprite is a dynamic web application platform integrating user authentication, gaming account linkage, community interaction, and administrative management to provide an engaging and seamless user experience for gamers and community members.
core_goals: Provide secure and user-friendly authentication and profile management.
Enable integration and synchronization with popular gaming platforms like Minecraft and Discord.
Offer rich user dashboards showcasing statistics, achievements, and gameplay styles.
Facilitate community engagement via discussion forums with rich content support.
Support administrative control tools for user, content, and event management.
Implement a virtual economy including gacha mechanisms and donation management.
Deliver a robust, reusable UI component library for consistent design and development efficiency.
key_features: Authentication & User Management using Supabase Auth for login, registration, and profile editing.
Game Integrations allowing linkage of web accounts to Minecraft and Discord identities with role synchronization and skin display.
Dashboard featuring user statistics, playstyle radar charts, achievements listings, and seasonal timelines.
Forum System enabling categorized discussions, threads creation, polls, and markdown support for content richness.
Admin Panel providing tools for managing users, support tickets, news publishing, and events orchestration.
Economy & Shop with a gacha system, virtual currency handling, and donation tracking.
Component Library bundled with Storybook for UI component visualization, testing, and development.
user_flow_summary: User registers or logs in through secure authentication system.
User links their gaming identities from Minecraft and Discord.
User accesses personalized dashboard to view their gaming statistics and achievements.
User participates in forum discussions by creating threads, posting replies, and voting in polls.
Administrators manage users, tickets, news, and community events via the admin panel.
Users engage with the in-app economy by spending virtual currency and participating in gacha draws.
Developers utilize the component library and Storybook to build and test UI components effectively.
validation_criteria: Successful user authentication and profile updates validated through Supabase integration.
Accurate linking and synchronization of Minecraft and Discord accounts verified by role and data consistency.
Dashboard data reflects real-time user statistics and displays correct gameplay analysis visually.
Forum supports markdown posts, polling functionality, and maintains responsive user interaction.
Admin panel functions correctly with role-restricted access and correct CRUD operations.
Economy features execute transactions properly including gacha draws and donation records.
UI components render correctly across supported browsers and pass Storybook visual testing and edge case scenarios.
